record.title: ORDERS FOR TUESDAY, JANUARY 9, 2007

speaking.paragraph: I ask unanimous consent that when the Senate completes its business today, it stand adjourned until 10 a.m., Tuesday, January 9; that on Tuesday, following the prayer and pledge, the Journal of proceedings be approved to date, the time for the two leaders be reserved for their use later in the day, and that there be a period of morning business until 11 a.m., with the Senator permitted to speak therein, with the first half controlled by the minority and the second half controlled by the majority; and that the Senate stand in recess from 12:30 until 2:15 for the party caucus luncheons.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.
